mapper.select: SELECT MSG.CONTENTS FROM MESSENGER M, MESSAGE MSG WHERE M.EMP_CODE = MSG.EMP_CODE AND M_SEQ = #{m_seq} ORDER BY MSG.WRITE_DATE

SELECT A.SEQ, A.CONTENTS, A.WRITE_DATE, A.EMP_CODE, A.M_SEQ, A.TYPE, A.SAVEDNAME, E.NAME EMPNAME FROM (SELECT MSG_VIEW.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MSG_VIEW.SEQ DESC)RN FROM (SELECT M.*, F.SAVEDNAME FROM MESSAGE M, FILES F WHERE M.SEQ = F.MSG_SEQ(+) AND M_SEQ = #{m_seq}) MSG_VIEW) A, EMPLOYEE_VIEW E WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum} AND A.EMP_CODE = E.CODE
SELECT MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'MESSAGE_SEQ'

SELECT A.*, B.NAME PARTY_EMPNAME FROM (SELECT MSG.*, V1.TYPE M_TYPE, V1.NAME, V1.PARTY_SEQ, V1.EMP_CODE PARTY_EMP_CODE, E.NAME EMPNAME FROM MESSAGE MSG, MESSENGER_VIEW V1, EMPLOYEE_VIEW E WHERE MSG.M_SEQ = V1.SEQ AND MSG.EMP_CODE = E.CODE AND M_SEQ IN (SELECT SEQ FROM MESSENGER_VIEW WHERE EMP_CODE = #{code}) AND ((V1.TYPE = 'S' AND V1.EMP_CODE!=#{code}) OR (V1.TYPE = 'M' AND V1.EMP_CODE = #{code}))) A, EMPLOYEE_VIEW B WHERE A.PARTY_EMP_CODE = B.CODE AND CONTENTS LIKE '%${contents}%' AND TYPE = 'TEXT' ORDER BY A.WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT SEQ, CONTENTS, WRITE_DATE, EMP_CODE, M_SEQ, TYPE, M_TYPE, NAME, PARTY_SEQ, PARTY_EMP_CODE, EMPNAME, PARTY_EMPNAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) RN, A.*, B.NAME PARTY_EMPNAME FROM (SELECT MSG.*, V1.TYPE M_TYPE, V1.NAME, V1.PARTY_SEQ, V1.EMP_CODE PARTY_EMP_CODE, E.NAME EMPNAME FROM MESSAGE MSG, MESSENGER_VIEW V1, EMPLOYEE_VIEW E WHERE MSG.M_SEQ = V1.SEQ AND MSG.EMP_CODE = E.CODE AND M_SEQ IN (SELECT SEQ FROM MESSENGER_VIEW WHERE EMP_CODE = #{code}) AND ((V1.TYPE = 'S' AND V1.EMP_CODE!=#{code}) OR (V1.TYPE = 'M' AND V1.EMP_CODE = #{code}))) A, EMPLOYEE_VIEW B WHERE A.PARTY_EMP_CODE = B.CODE AND CONTENTS LIKE '%${contents}%' AND TYPE = 'TEXT') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM MESSAGE WHERE M_SEQ = #{m_seq} AND CONTENTS LIKE '%${contents}%' AND TYPE='TEXT' ORDER BY SEQ DESC
